issue.title: [C++] Add gRPC version check
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6927](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6927). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need gRPC++ 1.17.0 or later.
